data.oai_dc:dc: SNPs and small indels identified for the 104 varieties analyzed in this study. All genotypes have an NGSEP genotyping quality score larger or equal than 40. Genomic coordinates are relative to IRGSP1.0. This file contains chromosome 6 from basepairs 1 to 16,000,000
Rice|Genomic variation|High throughput sequencing|Copy Number Variation|Marker assisted selection
